hooks.command: bash -c 'file_path=$(echo "$0" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // \"\"" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.py$ ]] || [[ "$PWD" =~ python-env ]]; then echo "ðŸ Auto-formatting Python files..." && cd python-env && devbox run format --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(ts|js|tsx|jsx)$ ]] || [[ "$PWD" =~ typescript-env ]]; then echo "ðŸ“˜ Auto-formatting TypeScript/JavaScript files..." && cd typescript-env && devbox run format --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.rs$ ]] || [[ "$PWD" =~ rust-env ]]; then echo "ðŸ¦€ Auto-formatting Rust files..." && cd rust-env && devbox run format --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.go$ ]] || [[ "$PWD" =~ go-env ]]; then echo "ðŸ¹ Auto-formatting Go files..." && cd go-env && devbox run format --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.nu$ ]] || [[ "$PWD" =~ nushell-env ]]; then echo "ðŸš Auto-formatting Nushell files..." && cd nushell-env && devbox run format --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; fi'

bash -c 'file_path=$(echo "$0" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // \"\"" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if [[ "$file_path" =~ test.*\.py$|.*_test\.py$|.*\.test\.py$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ§ª Running Python tests..." && cd python-env && devbox run test --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ .*\.(test|spec)\.(ts|js)$|.*\.test\.(tsx|jsx)$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ§ª Running TypeScript/JavaScript tests..." && cd typescript-env && devbox run test --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ .*_test\.rs$|tests/.*\.rs$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ§ª Running Rust tests..." && cd rust-env && devbox run test --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ .*_test\.go$|.*\.test\.go$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ§ª Running Go tests..." && cd go-env && devbox run test --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ test.*\.nu$|.*_test\.nu$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ§ª Running Nushell tests..." && cd nushell-env && devbox run test --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; fi'

bash -c 'command=$(echo "$0" | jq -r ".tool_input.command // \"\"" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if [[ "$command" =~ git.*commit ]]; then echo "ðŸ” Running pre-commit validation..." && if [[ "$PWD" =~ python-env ]]; then cd python-env && devbox run lint --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$PWD" =~ typescript-env ]]; then cd typescript-env && devbox run lint --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$PWD" =~ rust-env ]]; then cd rust-env && devbox run lint --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$PWD" =~ go-env ]]; then cd go-env && devbox run lint --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$PWD" =~ nushell-env ]]; then cd nushell-env && devbox run check --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; else echo "Running cross-language validation..." && nu nushell-env/scripts/validate.nu 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi'

bash -c 'file_path=$(echo "$0" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // \"\"" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(env|config|json|yaml|yml)$ ]]; then echo "ðŸ” Scanning for secrets in configuration files..." && (command -v git-secrets >/dev/null && git secrets --scan "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || echo "git-secrets not installed, skipping scan") || true; fi'

bash -c 'echo "ðŸŽ¯ Task completed! Running status check..."; git status 2>/dev/null || echo "Not in a git repository"; echo "ðŸ“Š Running cross-language validation summary..."; nu nushell-env/scripts/validate.nu --parallel 2>/dev/null || echo "Cross-language validation completed with some issues"'
bash -c 'echo "ðŸ”” Claude Code notification: $(echo "$0" | jq -r ".message // \"Unknown notification\"" 2>/dev/null || echo "Unknown notification")" >> ~/.claude/notifications.log'
